function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased use of online platforms and digital transformation may lead to excessive screen time and digital exhaustion.","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health and general well-being of individuals.","Mitigation":"Encourage breaks from screen time, promote digital detox, and provide mental health support.","Technologies":"Digital Well-being Apps, Screen Time Trackers.","People":"General population, especially those working remotely or dependent on online platforms.","Owner":"Employers, tech companies, and health organizations."},{"Description":"Reduced fossil fuel consumption due to remote working may lead to a decrease in transportation-related pollution levels.","Impact":"Potential positive impact on air quality and the environment.","Mitigation":"Invest in sustainable and renewable energy infrastructure, promote electric vehicles, and support telecommuting policies.","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, Electric vehicles, Telecommuting tools.","People":"General population, particularly those living in urban areas with high pollution levels.","Owner":"Government, environmental organizations, and companies supporting sustainable practices."},{"Description":"Increased online orders for food may lead to over-reliance on delivery services and potential food safety risks.","Impact":"Higher risk of food contamination during delivery and potential health hazards.","Mitigation":"Implement strict food safety standards for delivery services, educate consumers on safe food handling, and monitor delivery practices.","Technologies":"Food safety tracking systems, Contactless delivery technology.","People":"Consumers, delivery service providers, and food industry workers.","Owner":"Government authorities, food safety regulators, and delivery companies."}]}
